name: uncatchy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(especially of a name) not easy to remember or pleasant to say : It's a curiously uncatchy title for a series.
More examplesFewer examplesHe gave the condition the distinctly uncatchy name "chronic cerebrospinal venous insufficiency", or CCSVI.The un-catchy but addictive NBA 2K7 game has just been released.They chose "Augusta Tourinorum" as the somewhat uncatchy name for the new club.The Kepler telescope has found almost five thousand planet candidates, and every single one of them has an uncatchy name.
